law.text: A principal of a loan broker shall be liable under KRS 367.385 and 367.387 to the same extent as the loan broker himself for any actions on behalf of the loan broker, or the loan broker's agents, or employees, which violate KRS 367.381.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 301, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992.
